post.title: new panny hates my hummy.
post.content: hi guys. just got a new panny plasma with built in freeview. i ran the rf cable thru' my humax box to the tv and the tv doesn't pick up a signal. i works fine without the humax box but as soon as i loop thru' i lose the signal. any idea's? am i missing something so obvious i can't see it? seem's very strange to me.
